articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: Why McLaren thinks closer F1 qualifying gap to Red Bull is an 'illusion' - Motorsport.com
articles.description: McLaren boss Andrea Stella says it is an “illusion” to think that Formula 1 rivals are closing in on Red Bull based on shrinking qualifying gaps.
articles.content:
Major update pushes from Red Bulls rivals have appeared to lift teams like McLaren, Ferrari and Mercedes ever closer to F1s benchmark squad.
This seemed especially true in the sprint shootout qualif… [+3240 chars]
